trans-unit.source: Akroma, Angel of Fury can't be countered. Flying, trample, protection from white and from blue {R}: Akroma, Angel of Fury gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Morph {3}{R}{R}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

trans-unit.source: Archangel of Strife
trans-unit.target: Archangel of Strife

trans-unit.resname: V15·3 | Archangel of Strife | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Flying As Archangel of Strife enters the battlefield, each player chooses war or peace. Creatures controlled by players who chose war get +3/+0. Creatures controlled by players who chose peace get +0/+3.
trans-unit.target: Flying As Archangel of Strife enters the battlefield, each player chooses war or peace. Creatures controlled by players who chose war get +3/+0. Creatures controlled by players who chose peace get +0/+3.

trans-unit.target: Flying, vigilance, haste Whenever Aurelia, the Warleader attacks for the first time each turn, untap all creatures you control. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase.

trans-unit.resname: V15·4 | Aurelia, the Warleader | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Where Razia was aloof and untouchable, Aurelia is on the frontlines, calling for war.
trans-unit.target: Where Razia was aloof and untouchable, Aurelia is on the frontlines, calling for war.
